author: akarasulu
msg: Changed installer to keep bundle packages checked in as opposed to checking
in every file within the package.  Build script will unravel bundles for
changes into respective directories in packages/ directory.  Targets to
regenerate bundles to incorporate changes to directory layout also exist.

author: bearcej
msg: It would help mentioning the current way to apply the patch.

author: bearcej
msg: Added a diff file to update the default stylesheet in the Maven
DocBook plugin.  Also added a brief README file describing the diff.

author: bearcej
msg: Add maven.xdoc.version to properties file for newer versions of maven.

author: akarasulu
msg: Using standard placeholder in install bundle directories.
